price: 13. Marka Buunka (Qiyaame) la afuufo afuufid keliya (afuufka hore),
arabic: فَإِذَا نُفِخَ فِي ٱلصُّورِ نَفۡخَةٞ وَٰحِدَةٞ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: fa-idhā nufikha fī al-ṣūri nafkhatun wāḥidatun
